       <div id="wrapbox22034166">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22034166">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22034166">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22034166">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt22034166" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox22046438">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22046438">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22046438">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22046438">
          <div id="boxatt22046438" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25503953">
              <a id="link_25503953" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25503953,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25503955">
              <a id="link_25503955" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manic_Pixie_Dream_Girl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25503955,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25503955}); ">
               Sample Wikipedia entry: Manic Pixie Dream Girl
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22034167">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22034167">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22034167">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Evaluating sources for scholarly content
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22034167">
          <div id="boxatt22034167" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25492394">
              <a id="link_25492394" href="https://www.historians.org/publications-and-directories/perspectives-on-history/october-1998/translating-war-the-combat-film-genre-and-saving-private-ryan" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492394,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25492394}); ">
               Sample article on "Saving Private Ryan"
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492395">
              <a id="link_25492395" href="http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492395,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974165}); ">
               UlrichsWeb Periodicals Directory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is peer-reviewed or not, on international periodicals. It covers all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22034168">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22034168">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22034168">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do locate authoritative sources?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22034168">
          <div id="boxatt22034168" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25492378">
              <a id="link_25492378" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ufh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492378,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766292}); ">
               Communication and Mass Media Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and trade journals and books in media and communication and related areas. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492377">
              <a id="link_25492377" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492377,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492374">
              <a id="link_25492374" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492374,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25504030">
              <a id="link_25504030" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25504030,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492373">
              <a id="link_25492373" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492373,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492375">
              <a id="link_25492375" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492375,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766286}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492376">
              <a id="link_25492376" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492376,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22034170">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22034170">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22034170">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate partisan reviews?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22034170">
          <div id="boxatt22034170" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25492387">
              <a id="link_25492387" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492387,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Popular reviews and some film criticism. 1980s-present. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492412">
              <a id="link_25492412" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492412,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492388">
              Film review index
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Humanities Ref. 016.79143 F487r
               <br />
               Includes reviews of films made from 1882-1985.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492389">
              <a id="link_25492389" href="http://imdb.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492389,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25492389}); ">
               Internet Movie Database
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A good place for filmography and maybe some reviews.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492390">
              <a id="link_25492390" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492390,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369807}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Good source for current reviews. 1980s-present. May include filmographies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492411">
              <a id="link_25492411" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492411,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344565}); ">
               Reader's Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing of general-interest periodicals published in the United States for the period 1890-1982.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22126455">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22126455">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22126455">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Paragraph exercise
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22126455">
          <div id="boxatt22126455" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25596791">
              <a id="link_25596791" href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qfF_knIxGcEubaku5-7pAwpNO_nN7NGyM0PW3ZTtZvo/edit?usp=sharing" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25596791,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'CUE: Film Studies Seminar', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25596791}); ">
               Google Docs: Paragraph samples
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5827890" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox22034171">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22034171">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22034171">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22034171">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt22034171" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22034172">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22034172">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22034172">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22034172">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt22034172" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
